short.ar: Helix Stack Ball هي مغامرة مثيرة للكرة المرتدة في متاهة البرج الحلزوني.
short.am: Helix Stack ኳስ በspiral tower maze ውስጥ የሚንሸራተት አስደሳች ጀብዱ ነው.
short.bg: Helix Stack Ball е вълнуващо приключение на подскачаща топка в спирала кула лабиринт.
short.bn: হেলিক্স স্ট্যাক বল সর্পিল টাওয়ার গোলকধাঁধায় বাউন্সিং বল একটি উত্তেজনাপূর্ণ দু: সাহসিক কাজ।

short.gu: હેલિક્સ સ્ટેક બોલ એ સર્પાકાર ટાવરની ભુલભુલામણીમાં બોલને ઉછળવાનું એક ઉત્તેજક સાહસ છે.
short.he: Helix Stack Ball הוא הרפתקה מרגשת של כדור מקפיץ במבוך מגדל ספירלי.
short.hi: हेलिक्स स्टैक बॉल सर्पिल टॉवर भूलभुलैया में गेंद उछाल का एक रोमांचक साहसिक कार्य है।

short.ta: ஹெலிக்ஸ் ஸ்டேக் பால் சுழல் கோபுர பிரமை உள்ள பவுன்சிங் பந்து ஒரு அற்புதமான சாகச உள்ளது.
short.te: హెలిక్స్ స్టాక్ బాల్ అనేది స్పైరల్ టవర్ మేజ్ లో బంతిని బౌన్స్ చేసే ఉత్తేజకరమైన సాహసం.
short.th: Helix Stack Ball เป็นการผจญภัยที่น่าตื่นเต้นของการกระดอนลูกบอลในเขาวงกตหอคอยเกลียว

short.uk: Helix Stack Ball - захоплююча пригода підстрибуючої кулі в лабіринті спіральної вежі.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for a legendary casual game that has taken the world by storm. Pass the toughest levels and start the challenging adventure. The helix stack ball game has more than one hundred helix jump levels. The main objective of the Stack Ball game is to avoid obstacles while descending from the spiral and destroy all the stacks with the help of the ball.

Stacks you destroy in a row are combos, and you can destroy all stacks in a single move. In this way, you can complete the levels faster with the help of the combo in the helix jump game. When you complete each level, levels with different themes will be waiting for you.

How To Play
With the help of the mouse, you can make the automatic bouncing ball go down. In the helix stack ball game, where timing is essential, you must complete the level as quickly as possible without hitting the black obstacles in the spiral.

Helix Stack Ball Arcade Game Features
✓ Cartoon graphics
✓ 10+ Level
✓ Fun sounds
✓ Little particle
✓ Basic control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Helix Stack Ball Arcade Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
